articles.title: Sharon Stone says she lost custody of her son because of scene in Basic Instinct - The Guardian
articles.description: Actor says divorce judge asked her young son: ‘Do you know your mother makes sex movies?’
articles.content: The actor Sharon Stone has said that judicial prejudice caused her to lose custody of her son after the presiding judge in her 2004 divorce case asked the four-year-old whether he knew his mother mad… [+2492 chars]
